Output.CommentScriptContents
TYPE: bool
VERSION: 2.0.0
DEFAULT: true
--DESCRIPTION--
Determines whether or not HTML Purifier should attempt to fix up the
contents of script tags for legacy browsers with comments.
--ALIASES--
Core.CommentScriptContents
--# vim: et sw=4 sts=4
=======
Output.CommentScriptContents
TYPE: bool
VERSION: 2.0.0
DEFAULT: true
--DESCRIPTION--
Determines whether or not HTML Purifier should attempt to fix up the
contents of script tags for legacy browsers with comments.
--ALIASES--
Core.CommentScriptContents
